"Stelios Eliakis" <eliakis@...> writes:

> Thanks for your reply!
>
> I have already written a php function that handles DELETE ( I suppose).
> for example:
>
> if ($_SERVER['REQUEST_METHOD'] = DELETE )
> {
>            whatever
> }
>
> I do not know how can I integrate this function with apache so as 405 error
> do not appear.
> Do you know any module or something else because I try to Google it but I
> didn't find any resource.

If you have that called via mod_php then you should be fine.

This is not an Apache support list but you could send your apache
config and I'll take a look.
